title: [Large-scale] Flipped Learning-Based Foreign Language English Reading Comprehension Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Grammar and Vocabulary Comprehension
context.additional_context: Providing a blended learning environment combining digital devices and offline classes for beginner-level English reading education targeting office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can interpret English texts of various genres (news, abstracts, business documents) with over 70% accuracy
Learners can apply and discuss at least three reading comprehension strategies (e.g., skimming, scanning, inference) through in-class group activities
Learners can perform self-directed learning for at least two hours per week using materials provided on the digital platform (Moodle)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
